channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report E-2023080070
item.description:
Report E-2023080070

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-23T18:12:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-01
  • City: BUTTE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal UBU experienced a UN1823 Caustic Soda Beads release from (3) 50-pound poly bags. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-pound of product released impacting a 2' x 2' area of the trailer floor due to a pallet puncture. The damaged bags, released product, and impacted pallet pieces were containerized into a 55-gallon poly drum. The remaining cargo was re-secured for shipment on. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
